metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3606 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been classified as problematic. This affects the function find_prog_by_sec_insn of the file tools/lib/bpf/libbpf.c of the component BPF. The manipulation leads to null pointer dereference. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-211749 was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: dwarves-dfsg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
